body: Jabbar Savalan updates its readers on the case of a youth activist recently arrested in Azerbaijan. In its latest entry, the blog reports that the Dalga Youth Movement have issued a statement concerning the arrest [EN], while in another, it posts a photograph of a protest demonstration held in his support [AZ]. Chanting "we are all junkies," supporters of Jabbar Savalan believe that charges of drug possession are fabricated and politically motivated in the aftermath of protests in Egypt [EN].

title: Azerbaijan: We are all Junkies...

sentence: Jabbar Savalan updates its readers on the case of a youth activist recently arrested in Azerbaijan.

In its latest entry, the blog reports that the Dalga Youth Movement have issued a statement concerning the arrest [EN], while in another, it posts a photograph of a protest demonstration held in his support [AZ].
Chanting "we are all junkies," supporters of Jabbar Savalan believe that charges of drug possession are fabricated and politically motivated in the aftermath of protests in Egypt [EN].
